resources.string: To get you started please connect to the internet by turning on your wifi or cellular data.
To register with Morphidose, please enter your hospital number below, and press the submit button.
You are ready to start logging doses of your breakthrough pain relief.
Press the "Submit Breakthrough Dose" button every time you take a dose of your breakthrough medication. You will see a confirmation to verify that the dose has been logged.
All submitted doses have been sent to your prescriber.
IMPORTANT: You have submitted doses stored on your device. Before your next appointment, please connect to wifi or turn on your cellular data to allow these doses to be sent to your prescriber.
